parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - masculine singular construct

str2: Jonathan -- 'the LORD has given', the name of a number of Israelites
Merib-baal -- perhaps 'Baal is advocate', a son of Jonathan

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - masculine singular
Verb - Hifil - Perfect - third person masculine singular
str2: To bear young, to beget, medically, to act as midwife, to show lineage
Micah -- the name of several Israelites
